LOVE Building Passenger Elevator Unavailable 6/19 - 8/2
The passenger elevator will be unavailable for use beginning June 10th.
Facebook
Twitter
Email
Image of elevaor panel
May 24, 2021
— Atlanta, GA
A new passenger elevator will be installed in the LOVE Manufacturing Building during the months of June and July. Building staff and visitors must use the stairs during the replacement time period. Signage will be posted accordingly. Facilities Design & Construction apologizes for any inconvenience caused by this equipment upgrade. Thank you for your understanding.
Additional Images
Contact
Fenella Bryant
Construction Project Manager
Facilities Design & Construction
Email
fenella.bryant@facilities.gatech.edu
Additional information
Replacement of passenger elevator in the LOVE Building this summer.
